thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 71 of 625
thread.title: Sarah Keator

author: Sarah Keator
title: Sarah Keator
text: It's exciting and always easy to browse through Fabletics's monthly curated picks. The quality of the material is actually top notch and I haven't been dissatisfied yet (I've purchased about 10 outfits so far). I love how they offer tall sizes for their leggings. I'm 5'9" is a tall option is such a luxury. My only qualm is that some of the outfit patterns are not practical for fitness use. I know it's about style, but some of the yoga tops that have cut-outs can be hard to move in. Besides that, I'd recommend Fabletics to anyone!
